description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to increase the level of respect of women rights and gender equality in employment in Montenegro. This objective will be supported by 2 specific objectives of the project: 1. To raise awareness of the all stakeholders and the general public about the need for equal rights and access to employment, with special focus on women. 2. To advocate for a higher level of accountability of relevant authorities in protecting working rights of women. The strategy to achieve these objectives will involve the launching of a strong public awareness and advocacy campaign through a series of actions, including the organization of public panel discussions, conducting of qualitative research, publication of investigative analyses on the position of women in employment, advocating towards main authorities to improve protection of women labour and employment rights and various promotional activities. Representatives of relevant authorities, international organizations, CSOs advocating for gender equality and other stakeholders will be invited to participate in public panels, campaign and advocacy activities and other actions aimed at encouraging greater access and respect of women rights in employment. The project has 3 results that are to be reached through a cluster of activities for each, all leading towards the achievement of the foreseen objectives: Result 1: Position of women in Montenegro with regards to their labour rights and equal access to employment investigated and assessed by CIN-CG and Monitor. Result 2: Raised awareness of main stakeholders and the general public about the necessity of equal pay and access to employment of both sexes; and Result 3: Advocated towards relevant authorities and other national and international stakeholders about the need for a higher level of enforcement of laws and protection of women working rights in Montenegro.
